content: To reach Purple Cloud Mountain, you will have to defeat the Venom Daoist twice - both in the Upper Webbed Hollow, and in a side path outside the Temple of Yellow Flowers main area. This will unlock a mural allowing you to travel to this new area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Scorpionlord.md', within the main section titled 'The Scorpionlord', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Scorpionlord'.
The content is as follows:
To reach Purple Cloud Mountain, you will have to defeat the Venom Daoist twice - both in the Upper Webbed Hollow, and in a side path outside the Temple of Yellow Flowers main area. This will unlock a mural allowing you to travel to this new area.
